TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpRuntimeSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class HttpRuntimeSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 設定 ASP.NET HTTP 執行階段。

span.span: Configures the ASP.NET HTTP runtime.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您處理這些影響的 ASP.NET 執行階段行為的參數。The allows you to handle those parameters that affect the behavior of the ASP.NET runtime. 它是指項目所表示而且可用的組態階層架構中任何層級的組態檔中的節點。It refers to the node in the configuration file that is indicated by the element and can be used at any level in the configuration hierarchy. 區段包含管理下的指示詞：The section contains directives that manage the following: - 要求執行逾時。Request execution timeouts. - 執行緒排程在應用程式層級的指示詞。Directives to thread scheduling at the application level. - 指示詞，以管理應用程式佇列限制。Directives that govern application queue limits. - 要求長度。Request length. 當單一處理序中執行多個應用程式，您應該鎖定本節，讓應用程式無法在另一台，提高其相對優先權。When running more than one application in a single process, you should lock down this section so that applications cannot elevate their relative priority to one another.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用預設值初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using default settings.

span.span: The default is .

value.span: 如果允許 方法呼叫，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether application apartment threading is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用應用程式 Apartment 執行緒則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if application apartment threading is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是 `false`。The default value is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int AppRequestQueueLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示 ASP.NET 要為應用程式加入佇列的最大要求數目。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the maximum number of requests that ASP.NET queues for the application.

value.span: 可以加入佇列的最大要求數目。

span.span: The maximum number of requests that can be queued.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 沒有足夠的可用執行緒來處理它們時，ASP.NET 排入佇列的要求。ASP.NET queues requests when there are not enough free threads to process them. > [!NOTE] > 當佇列的要求數目超過這個設定所加諸的限制時，傳入的要求會被拒絕與 「 503-伺服器忙碌中 」 錯誤。When the number of requests queued exceeds the limit imposed by this setting, incoming requests will be rejected with a "503 - Server Too Busy" error. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Configuration::AsyncPreloadModeFlags AsyncPreloadMode { System::Web::Configuration::AsyncPreloadModeFlags get(); void set(System::Web::Configuration::AsyncPreloadModeFlags value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定非同步預先載入之要求實體的模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the mode of the request entity that is asynchronously preloaded.

value.span: 要求實體的模式。

span.span: The mode of the request entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性必須設定才能ASP.NET 管線中設定。This property must to be set before is set in the ASP.NET pipeline.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan DefaultRegexMatchTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time that a regular expression is allowed in order to perform a match.

value.span: 規則運算式比對所允許的時間。

span.span: The time that is allowed for regular-expression matching.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan DelayNotificationTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定變更告知延遲。

span.span: Gets or sets the change notification delay.

value.span: 指定變更告知延遲的時間 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: The time, in seconds, that specifies the change notification delay.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以定址資訊寫入回掃描的檔案，藉由設定時，某些防毒應用程式，所造成的問題屬性。You can address the problem caused by some antivirus applications, when writing information back to the scanned files, by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 因為無法區別因防毒掃描的檔案變更，從使用者所做的項目，就會發生問題。The problem occurs because file changes caused by antivirus scanning cannot be distinguished from the ones made by the user. 最終結果是在重新啟動應用程式正在掃描的檔案。The end result is the restart of the application whose files are being scanned. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示是否啟用應用程式定義域。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the application domain is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用應用程式定義域則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the application domain is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個設定會影響應用程式或多個網域在目前的節點層級和以下版本。This setting affects the application domain or domains at the current node level and below. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#14)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableHeaderChecking { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示是否啟用標頭檢查。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the header checking is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用標頭檢查則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the header checking is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的目的是要啟用的歸位字元和新行字元的編碼方式`\r`和`\n`，回應標頭中發現的。The purpose of this property is to enable encoding of the carriage return and newline characters, `\r` and `\n`, that are found in response headers. 在輸出回應標頭、 以碼 0x1F 表示，而且以下編碼的字元和字元 0x7F （刪除字元）。In outbound response headers, the characters that are represented by the codes 0x1F and below are encoded and also the character 0x7F (delete character). 唯一的例外狀況是未修改的字元 0x09 （定位字元）。The only exception is that the character 0x09 (the tab character) is unmodified. 這種編碼方式可協助您避免插入式攻擊，以回應標頭所包含的資料不受信任的應用程式。This encoding can help to avoid injection attacks that exploit an application that echoes untrusted data contained by the header. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性的狀態行本身 （狀態碼和狀態描述），則不適用，但應套用至其他標頭。This property does not apply to the status line itself (status code and status description), but should apply to other headers. 雖然可以在任何層級設定，這個屬性才適用電腦和應用程式層級。Although can be set at any level, this property is only applicable at the machine and application level. 當這個屬性是`true`，這是預設值，`\r`或`\n`回應標頭中找到的字元會編碼為`%0d`和`%0a`。When this property is `true`, which is the default, the `\r` or `\n` characters found in a response header are encoded to `%0d` and `%0a`. 這是藉由插入材料屬於相同的標頭行失去標頭資料隱碼攻擊。This defeats header-injection attacks by making the injected material part of the same header line. 這可能會中斷回應，但不是應開啟對用戶端的攻擊媒介。This might break the response but should not open attack vectors against the client. 回應未受信任的資料絕不會是個不錯的主意，在任何情況下，雖然。Echoing back untrusted data is never a good idea in any situation, though. > [!IMPORTANT] > HTTP 標頭接續依賴跨越多行的標頭，而且需要新行。HTTP header continuations rely on headers spanning multiple lines and require new lines in them. 如果您需要使用接續標頭，您需要設定屬性`false`。If you need to use header continuations, you need to set the property to `false`. 因為效能造成影響，查看標頭，如果您確定您已進行正確的檢查，關閉此功能可以改善應用程式的效能。Because there is a performance impact from looking at headers, if you are certain you are already doing the right checks, turning off this feature can improve the performance of your application. 停用此功能之前，先確定您已經在這個區域中花費正確的預防措施。Before you disable this feature, be sure you are already taking the right precautions in this area. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableKernelOutputCache { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示是否啟用輸出快取。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether output caching is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用輸出快取則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if output caching is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要快取的回應，必須符合下列準則：In order to cache a response, the following criteria need to be met: - 快取必須明確啟用網頁指示詞或快取 API。Caching must be explicitly enabled by a page directive or by the caching API. - 快取必須有到期原則，如此核心可得知何時將它捨棄。Caching must have an expiration policy so that the kernel knows when to discard it. - 快取不能有任何變數的標頭或參數。Caching cannot have any variable headers or parameters. - 要求必須不需要任何驗證。The request must not require any authentication. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性在安裝網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 6.0 或更新版本時，才會相關。This property is relevant only when Internet Information Services (IIS) version 6.0 or later is installed. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableVersionHeader { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示 ASP.NET 是否應輸出版本標頭。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether ASP.NET should output a version header.

value.span: 如果啟用版本標頭的輸出則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the output of the version header is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可由 Visual Studio 來判斷哪個版本的 ASP.NET 中使用。This attribute is used by Visual Studio to determine which version of ASP.NET is in use. 它不需要實際執行的網站，並可以停用。It is not necessary for production sites and can be disabled. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ EncoderType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定可用於處理 HTML 及 URL 編碼之自訂類型的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a custom type that can be used to handle HTML and URL encoding.

value.span: 類型的名稱，這個類型可用於處理 HTML 和 URL 編碼。

span.span: The name of a type that can be used to handle HTML and URL encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 會使用與 HTML 及 URL 編碼工作的預設處理常式的類型。ASP.NET uses the type as the default handler for HTML and URL encoding tasks. 若要自訂編碼的行為，您可以建立繼承自一個類別型別。To customize encoding behavior, you can create a class that inherits from the type. 在應用程式的組態檔，您再設定屬性`httpRuntime`自訂類型的完整限定的字串名稱的項目。In the configuration file for an application, you then set the attribute of the `httpRuntime` element to the fully qualified string name of the custom type. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ExecutionTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要求所允許的執行時間。

span.span: Gets or sets the allowed execution time for the request.

value.span: 值，表示要求所允許的執行時間。

span.span: A value that indicates the allowed execution time for the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示的 ASP.NET 自動關閉前執行，允許要求的秒數上限。The property indicates the maximum number of seconds a request is allowed to execute before being automatically shut down by ASP.NET. 預設為 110 的秒數。The default is 110 seconds. 只有當項目中的偵錯屬性設定為這個逾時值會套用`false`。This time-out applies only if the debug attribute in the element is set to `false`. 如果在逾時到期會引發例外狀況。If the time-out expires an exception is raised. 您可以在事件記錄檔的應用程式資料夾中記錄的相關的資訊。You can record the related information in the Application folder of the Event Log. 您可以啟用應用程式健全狀況監視的組態項目中。You do this by enabling the application health monitoring in the configuration element. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#10)]

exception.span: 要求的執行時間已超過由執行逾時設定的限制。

span.span: The request execution time exceeded the limit set by the execution time-out.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Configuration::FcnMode FcnMode { System::Web::Configuration::FcnMode get(); void set(System::Web::Configuration::FcnMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定指定檔案變更通知模式的列舉值。

span.span: Gets or sets an enumeration value specifying the file change notifications mode.

value.span: 列舉值。

span.span: An enumeration value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxQueryStringLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 HTTP 要求中查詢字串的最大可能長度 (以字元數為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum possible length, in number of characters, of a query string in an HTTP request.

value.span: 查詢字串的最大長度，以字元數為單位。

span.span: The maximum length of the query string, in number of characters.

value.span: 預設值為 2048。

span.span: The default is 2048.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性可以是任何整數，零或更大。The value of the property can be any integer, zero or larger. 如果查詢字串的長度會超過大小限制，ASP.NET 會傳回`HTTP 400`（不正確的要求） 狀態碼。If the length of a query string exceeds the size limit, ASP.NET returns an `HTTP 400` (Bad Request) status code. > [!NOTE] > 極小的值可能使網站無法使用。Extremely small values can make a Web site unusable. 您可以在組態檔中設定此值，藉由設定`maxQueryStringLength`屬性`httpRuntime`項目。You can set this value in a configuration file by setting the `maxQueryStringLength` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369). > [!NOTE] > 也是 IIS 設定會控制查詢字串長度。There is also an IIS setting that controls query string length. 請參閱`maxQueryString`屬性[要求限制\](http://www.iis.net/ConfigReference/system.webServer/security/requestFiltering/requestLimits)。See the `maxQueryString` attribute in [Request Limits \](http://www.iis.net/ConfigReference/system.webServer/security/requestFiltering/requestLimits).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxRequestLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定最大要求大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum request size.

value.span: 最大要求大小 (以 KB 為單位)。

span.span: The maximum request size in kilobytes.

value.span: 預設大小為 4096 KB (4 MB)。

span.span: The default size is 4096 KB (4 MB).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性指定的輸入資料流緩衝臨界值的限制。The property specifies the limit for the buffering threshold of the input stream. 比方說，這項限制可以用來防止阻絕服務攻擊所造成的張貼至伺服器的大型檔案的使用者。For example, this limit can be used to prevent denial of service attacks that are caused by users who post large files to the server. 指派給這個屬性的值應該大於或等於值指派給屬性。The value assigned to this property should be greater or equal to value assigned to the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得目前屬性值。The following example shows how to obtain the current property value. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#19)]

span.span: The selected value is less than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxUrlLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 HTTP 要求中 URL 的最大可能長度 (以字元數為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum possible length, in number of characters, of the URL in an HTTP request.

value.span: URL 的長度 (以字元數為單位)。

span.span: The length of the URL, in number of characters.

value.span: 預設值為 260。

span.span: The default is 260.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性可以是任何整數，零或更大。The value of the property can be any integer, zero or larger. > [!NOTE] > 極小的值可能使網站無法使用。Extremely small values can make a Web site unusable. 如果要求 URL 的長度 (即值屬性) 超過設定的大小限制，ASP.NET 會傳回 HTTP 400 （不正確的要求） 狀態碼If the length of the request URL (which is the value of the property) exceeds the configured size limit, ASP.NET returns an HTTP 400 (Bad Request) status code 您可以在組態檔中設定此值，藉由設定屬性`httpRuntime`項目。You can set this value in a configuration file by setting the attribute of the `httpRuntime` element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxWaitChangeNotification { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定第一次變更告知與重新啟動應用程式定義域之間的時間間隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the time interval between the first change notification and the time at which the application domain is restarted.

value.span: 第一個變更告知與重新啟動應用程式定義域之間的最大時間間隔 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: The maximum time interval, in seconds, from the first change notification and the time when the application domain is restarted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建議的值屬性會超過複本完成部署程序期間的時間長度。A suggested value for the property would exceed the length of time to complete a copy during the deployment process. > [!NOTE] > 如果您檢視複製並部署處理程序之後，立即，該內容可能會顯示快取。The content might appear cached if you view it immediately after a copy-and-deploy process. 這是典型的行為。This is typical behavior. 當您指定的等待期間已經耗盡時所做的變更才會生效。The changes take effect when the wait period that you specified has elapsed. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinFreeThreads { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定執行緒的最小數目，這些執行序在可用於這個組態範圍中的資源要求之前，必須是無限制的。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum number of threads that must be free before a request for resources in this configuration scope can be serviced.

value.span: 在用於這個組態範圍中的要求之前，Common Language Runtime (CLR) 執行緒集區中之無限制執行緒的最小數目。

span.span: The minimum number of free threads in the common language runtime (CLR) thread pool before a request in this configuration scope will be serviced.

value.span: 預設值是8。

span.span: The default value is 8.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會定義最小無限制執行緒來執行要求的數目。The property defines the minimum number of free threads to execute a request. 如果不到有足夠數目的執行緒，則要求會保留在佇列，直到所需的執行緒數量有，會繼續定期檢查執行緒可用性。If a sufficient number of threads are not available, the request will remain queued and periodic checks for thread availability will continue until the required amount of threads are present. 預設值是 `8`。The default value is `8`. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 會保留許多執行緒可用需要更多的執行緒，才能完成處理的要求。ASP.NET keeps this many threads free for requests that require additional threads to complete their processing. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinLocalRequestFreeThreads { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要用於本機要求所需的最小無限制執行緒數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum number of free threads required to service a local request.

value.span: 指派給本機要求的最小無限制執行緒數目。

span.span: The minimum number of free threads assigned to local requests.

value.span: 預設值為 4。

span.span: The default value is 4.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性定義 ASP.NET 持續可用以允許執行新的本機要求的可用執行緒數目。The property defines the number of free threads that ASP.NET keeps available to allow execution of new local requests. 目的是為了避免遞迴重新進入的可能死結進入 Web 伺服器。The intent is to avoid a possible deadlock with recursive reentry into the Web server. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As ConfigurationPropertyCollection
public: property bool RelaxedUrlToFileSystemMapping { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 HTTP 要求中的 URL 是否必須為有效的 Windows 檔案路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the URL in an HTTP request is required to be a valid Windows file path.

value.span: 如果 URL 不需要符合 Windows 路徑規則則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the URL does not have to comply with Windows path rules; otherwise .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定如何將驗證傳入的 HTTP 要求中的 URL。The property determines how the URL in an incoming HTTP request will be validated. 如果這個屬性是`false`，使用相同的規則，判斷是否為有效的 Windows 檔案系統路徑來驗證 URL。If this property is `false`, the URL is validated by using the same rules that determine whether a Windows file system path is valid. 您可以在組態檔中設定此值，藉由設定屬性`httpRuntime`項目。You can set this value in a configuration file by setting the attribute of the `httpRuntime` element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int RequestLengthDiskThreshold { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定輸入資料流緩衝臨界值。

span.span: Gets or sets the input-stream buffering threshold.

value.span: 表示輸入資料流緩衝臨界值的位元組數目。

span.span: The number of bytes that indicate the input-stream buffering threshold.

value.span: 預設為 80 KB。

span.span: The default is 80 kilobytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定輸入資料流緩衝臨界值上限的位元組數。The property specifies the input-stream buffering threshold limit in number of bytes. 其值不應該超過屬性值。Its value should not exceed the property value. 要求實體超過此閾值，則其會被無障礙地緩衝到磁碟上。After a request entity exceeds this threshold, it is buffered transparently onto disk. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#12)]

span.span: The selected value is greater than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ RequestPathInvalidCharacters { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定字元的清單，這份清單指定在 HTTP 要求所包含的路徑中會變得無效的字元。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of characters that are specified as invalid in a path that is part of an HTTP request.

value.span: 無效字元的逗號分隔清單。

span.span: A comma-separated list of invalid characters.

value.span: 下列清單包含一組預設的無效字元：

span.span: The following list contains the default set of invalid characters:

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在組態檔中設定這個值，您可以指派以逗號分隔的字元字串`requestPathInvalidCharacters`屬性`httpRuntime`項目。To set this value in a configuration file, you can assign a comma-separated string of characters to the `requestPathInvalidCharacters` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Version ^ RequestValidationMode { Version ^ get(); void set(Version ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定版本號碼，這個版本號碼表示要使用哪一種 ASP.NET 版本特定驗證方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a version number that indicates which ASP.NET version-specific approach to validation will be used.

value.span: 一個值，表示要使用哪一種 ASP.NET 版本特定驗證方法。

span.span: A value that indicates which ASP.NET version-specific approach to validation will be used.

value.span: 預設值是4.5。

span.span: The default is 4.5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定將使用哪一個 ASP.NET 驗證方法。The property specifies which ASP.NET approach to validation will be used. 這可以是比版本 4 或使用中的版本更早版本的 ASP.NET 中使用的演算法[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]。This can be the algorithm that is used in versions of ASP.NET earlier than version 4, or the version that is used in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]. 這個屬性可以設定為下列值：The property can be set to the following values: - `4.5 (the default).` 在此模式中，延遲載入值，也就是它們無法讀取，直到要求。`4.5 (the default).` In this mode, values are lazily loaded, that is, they are not read until they are requested. - `4.0` 物件在內部設定的旗標，指出只要存取任何 HTTP 要求資料時，會觸發要求驗證。`4.0` The object internally sets a flag that indicates that request validation should be triggered whenever any HTTP request data is accessed. 這可確保資料，例如 cookie 之前不會觸發要求驗證，並要求期間所存取的 Url。This guarantees that the request validation is triggered before data such as cookies and URLs are accessed during the request. 要求驗證的設定組態檔中的項目 （如果有的話） 或的個別頁面中的指示詞會被忽略。The request validation settings of the element (if any) in the configuration file or of the directive in an individual page are ignored. - `2.0`。`2.0`. 僅針對不會針對所有 HTTP 要求的頁面已啟用要求驗證。Request validation is enabled only for pages, not for all HTTP requests. 此外，要求驗證的設定組態檔中的項目 （如果有的話） 或的個別頁面中的指示詞可用來判斷哪一頁要求驗證。In addition, the request validation settings of the element (if any) in the configuration file or of the directive in an individual page are used to determine which page requests to validate. 指派給這個屬性的值不會驗證比對特定版本的 ASP.NET。The value that you assign to this property is not validated to match a specific version of ASP.NET. 任何數字的值小於`4.0`(例如， `3.7`， `2.9`，或`2.0`) 會解譯為`2.0`。Any numeric value smaller than `4.0` (for example, `3.7`, `2.9`, or `2.0`) is interpreted as `2.0`. 任何數字大於`4.5`解譯為`4.5`。Any number larger than `4.5` is interpreted as `4.5`. 若要在組態檔中設定這個值，您可以指派值給`requestValidationMode`屬性`httpRuntime`項目。To set this value in a configuration file, you can assign a value to the `requestValidationMode` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ RequestValidationType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用於驗證 HTTP 要求的類型名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a type that is used to validate HTTP requests.

value.span: 負責處理要求驗證工作的類型名稱。

span.span: The name of a type that handles request validation tasks.

value.span: 預設值為 ASP.NET 用於驗證之 類型的完整名稱。

span.span: The default is the fully qualified name of the type that ASP.NET uses for validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要自訂 ASP.NET 要求的驗證行為，您可以建立繼承自一個類別型別。To customize ASP.NET request validation behavior, you can create a class that inherits from the type. 在應用程式的組態檔，您再設定`requestValidationType`屬性`httpRuntime`自訂類型的完整限定的字串名稱的項目。In the configuration file for an application, you then set the `requestValidationType` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element to the fully qualified string name of the custom type. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RequireRootedSaveAsPath { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示檔名是否必須是完整的實體檔案路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the file name must be a fully qualified physical file path.

value.span: 如果檔名是完整的實體檔案路徑則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the file name must be a fully qualified physical file path; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定檔案名稱引數是否`SaveAs`方法必須是根的路徑。The property specifies whether the file name argument to `SaveAs` methods must be a rooted path. ASP.NET 處理序必須在指定的位置中建立檔案的權限。The ASP.NET process must have permission to create files in the specified location. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱方法定義中的儲存類別。For more information, see the save methods defined in the class. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SendCacheControlHeader { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示是否將 cache-control:private 標頭作為 HTTP 回應的一部分傳送。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the cache-control:private header is sent as part of the HTTP response.

value.span: 如果快取的控制項： 私用標頭已傳送，否則。

span.span: if the cache-control:private header is to be sent; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會檢查兩者屬性和屬性來判斷是否要將傳送`cache-control:private`中 HTTP 回應標頭。The class checks both the property and the property to determine whether to send the `cache-control:private` header in the HTTP response. 如果任一個屬性設定為`false`，將不會傳送標頭。If either property is set to `false`, the header will not be sent. 當快取控制標頭設定為`private`，則用戶端不會快取中的共用快取的回應。When the cache-control header is set to `private`, then the client will not cache the response in a shared cache. 支援屬性類別會提供的舊版應用程式的相容性，則這個屬性是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已過時。Support for the property in the class is provided for compatibility with legacy applications; this property is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class.

public: property TimeSpan ShutdownTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定終止應用程式之前允許它閒置的時間長度。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time the application is allowed to idle before it is terminated.

value.span: 值，表示終止應用程式之前允許它閒置的時間長度。

span.span: A value that indicates the length of time the application is allowed to idle before it is terminated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示應用程式依正常程序關閉之前的時間量。The property indicates the amount of time before an application is shut down gracefully. 預設為 90 秒。The default is 90 seconds. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#6)]

summary.span: 取得或設定目標 .NET Framework。

span.span: Gets or sets the target .NET framework.

value.span: 目標 .NET Framework。

span.span: The target .NET framework.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseFullyQualifiedRedirectUrl { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示用戶端重新導向是否為完整的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the client-side redirects are fully qualified.

value.span: 如果用戶端重新導向為完整的則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if client-side redirects are fully qualified; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出用戶端重新導向是否為完整名稱 (格式http://server/path)或是否相對重新導向而會傳送至用戶端。The property indicates whether client-side redirects are fully qualified (in the form http://server/path) or whether relative redirects are instead sent to the client. > [!NOTE] > 某些瀏覽器可能會發生在當這個值是無 cookie 工作階段中載入網頁的問題`false`。Some browsers might have problems loading pages in cookieless sessions when this value is `false`. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int WaitChangeNotification { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定下一個變更告知之前的等待時間。

span.span: Gets or sets the waiting time before the next change notification.

value.span: 觸發應用程式定義域重新啟動之下一個變更告知之前的等待時間 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: The waiting time, in seconds, before the next change notification that triggers an application domain to restart.

value.span: 預設值為 0。

span.span: The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建議的值會超過複本完成部署程序期間的時間長度。A suggested value for would exceed the length of time to complete a copy during the deployment process. > [!NOTE] > 如果您檢視複製之後，立即和部署程序，該內容可能會顯示快取。The content might appear cached if you view it immediately after a copy and deploy process. 這是典型的行為。This is typical behavior. 當您指定的等待期間已經耗盡時所做的變更才會生效。The changes take effect when the wait period that you specified has elapsed. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#18)]
